hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Left
Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Magic Beans# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that in the #Sacred Forest Meadow#, Sheik teaches #the Bolero of Fire#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that a #spider behind webs# in a grotto holds #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##Zora's Domain## has #1# major item.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the way of the hero.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the path of #Skulls#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Water Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the path of #Skulls#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #northern basement of the Water Temple# contains...^ #a Map of the Water Temple# and #a Water Temple Compass#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

hinted_locations: LW Deku Scrub Near Deku Theater Left

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say it's 106 miles to Hyrule Castle, we have half a bar of magic, it's dark, and we're wearing sunglasses.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Saria's Song#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Ice Cavern# corridors ring with #the Minuet of Forest#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals #Damp√©'s Grave#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Lab).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Saria's Song#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: Why are the floating skulls called "Bubbles" and the floating bubbles "Shaboms"?

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that in the #crater, a spider in a crate and a single scrub# guard...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that ##inside Ganon's Castle## has #4# major items.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #at the Desert Colossus#, skulltulas at night hold...^ #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Water Temple Small Key# and #Epona's Song#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
